# Welcome {-}

This tutorial provides a concise introduction to the fundamental concepts of probability theory and statistics essential for econometricians and data analysts.

**Current Status:** This tutorial is still under development.

The sections presented here originate from the *Statistics for Data Analytics* course taught in Winter Term 2024, offering a comprehensive review of probability theory.

For a quick foundational review, I recommend sections 2 and 3 of Stock and Watson (2019): [Textbook Link](https://elibrary.pearson.de/book/99.150005/9781292264523)
